00001	//
00002	//-----------------------------------------------------------
00003	class XIIIMPTeamMutator extends XIIIMPMutator;
00004	
00005	var bool AddStorage;
00006	
00007	function bool CheckReplacement(Actor Other, out byte bSuperRelevant)
00008	{
00009	    local XIIIMPTeamStorage BTS;
00010	
00011	    if( ! AddStorage )
00012	    {
00013	        AddStorage = true;
00014	        BTS = Spawn(class'XIIIMPTeamStorage',,, Other.Location);
00015	        BTS.TeamId=0;
00016	        BTS = Spawn(class'XIIIMPTeamStorage',,, Other.Location);
00017	        BTS.TeamId=1;
00018	    }
00019	
00020	    return true;
00021	}
